title: Drawing, Design after 13th Century Arcade, Bologna; Verso, Anatomical Study, 1811–14
title_raw: Design after 13th Century Arcade, Bologna; Verso, Anatomical Study
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscription: Fabrica del due cento Bologna
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Double sided sheet from sketchbook. Recto, courtyard shown through double arcade in room. At right, column detail; group of columns.  Inscription: Fabrica del due cento Bologna. Verso, left hand and top part of left leg.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design after 13th Century Arcade, Bologna; Verso, Anatomical Study, 1811–14. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1202
